General.Name: Molinos Juan Semino SA
General.Description: Molinos Juan Semino S.A. engages in the production and sale of cereals in Argentina. It offers flours, gluten, native and modified starches dextrins, proteins, and pre-mixes, as well as byproducts. The company's products are used in the food, refrigeration, textile, paper, and other industries. Molinos Juan Semino S.A. was founded in 1865 and is based in Carcarañá, Argentina.
